T02D2337:299b-1: shr'i tsakra samba ro pa de sha mu kha karna pa rampa ra tsint'a ma ni n'a ma /
T02D2337:299b-3: dpal 'khor lo sdom pa'i man ngag zhal nas snyan
T02D2337:299b-4: du brgyud pa yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya ba
T02D2337:299b-5: / dpal rdo rje sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2337:300a-0: sku gsum bdag nyid dgos 'byung bla ma dam pa'i zhabs @300a * //
T02D2337:300a-1: pad ze 'bru dri med 'od zer la phyag 'tshal //
T02D2337:300a-2: gsang sngags mthar thug snying po'i bcud phyung yid bzhin
T02D2337:300a-3: nor bu mkha' 'gro'i gsung bzhin rtogs pas 'dri gsal
T02D2337:300a-4: bkod // bde gshegs thugs la snang ba dri med
T02D2337:300a-5: panytsa pa nas rtogs pas ke ri li ru gsang
T02D2337:300a-6: bkod // bdag ma nyes // spyod pas zil mnan
T02D2337:300a-7: lus kyi bkod pas rnal 'byor rjes su bzung mdzad
T02D2337:300a-8: pa tha mas 'gro rnams stong par byas //
T02D2337:300a-9: bslab pa gsum dang brgyud par ldan pa nyams su
T02D2337:300a-10: myong bas 'jug tshul shes pas bla ma dam par
T02D2337:300a-11: shes // sen dha ba dang rigs chad bran ltar
T02D2337:300a-12: rus sbal spu ste mo gsham bu ltar slob ma
T02D2337:300a-13: shes // skyon lnga bral // mchog gi don 'dod
T02D2337:300a-14: gang gi de brten thog mar dbang bzhis rgyud smin
T02D2337:300a-15: thabs dang shes rab 'brel pa nyid //
T02D2337:300a-16: 'di don rim bar brgyud pa rna bar 'pho byed
T02D2337:300a-17: de tshe sangs rgyas bstan gnas gus pas mnyan par
T02D2337:300a-18: gyis // sa yi cho ga lhag par gnas pa
T02D2337:300a-19: rig byed slob dpon rig sbyor sogs kyis bum pa'i
T02D2337:300a-20: gyis // dbang bskur bya // bslab pas rgyud mdzes
T02D2337:300a-21: thos bsam nor ldan bla mar 'os pa phul ba
T02D2337:300a-22: bla mas gsal stong la sogs bskur //
T02D2337:300a-23: nyer lnga lhag spangs rigs ldan rgyan spras zag bcas
T02D2337:300a-24: bskul sogs gsum pa byin nas brtul zhugs brtan par
T02D2337:300a-25: bya // dga' ba gsum son lha'ang cig skyes pa
T02D2337:300a-26: rnyog pa dang bral yul du bya sogs 'bras bur
T02D2337:300a-27: bya // shes par gyi // dbang bzhi dang 'brel
T02D2337:300a-28: brda yis mtshon pa shes rab bdag nyid sindhu ra
T02D2337:300a-29: la mnyes sogs ston mos brgyan //
T02D2337:300a-30: slob dpon bzhi la dbang bzhi dus bzhi byed pa
T02D2337:300a-31: bcu gnyis chos nyid dbang la mtshon du med par
T02D2337:300a-32: byos // dbang gis smin nas rim pa gnyis shes
T02D2337:300a-33: rnal 'byor dbang phyug zung du 'jug pa rgyal ba'i
T02D2337:300a-34: byos // sku sgrub phyir // dbang po'i rim pas
T02D2337:300a-35: dbye dang bsdu ba'i rim pa shes nas 'du 'dzi
T02D2337:300a-36: med par rgyun du 'bad pas spyad //
T02D2337:300a-37: tshangs pa'i gnas bzhi gsol dang khams sogs bslab pa
T02D2337:300a-38: 'khor lo tshogs brten rgyu 'bras nyid dang phra mor
T02D2337:300a-39: brjod // go cha ye shes rgyas btab sku gsung
T02D2337:300a-40: mchod dang bzlas pa rdzogs rim phrin las phyogs dang
T02D2337:300a-41: brjod // thub pa nyid // bsdus pa'i sbyor ba
T02D2337:300b-0: tshad med @300b bzhi ldan rdzus te skyes pa skad
T02D2337:300b-1: cig rnal 'byor bzlas par bcas pa nyid //
T02D2337:300b-2: brtan g-yo'i dngos po lhan cig skyes pa snang sems
T02D2337:300b-3: dbyer med rnon po'i spyod yul zung 'jug rdo rje'i
T02D2337:300b-4: sku // kun la khyab pa'i ngo bo nyid ston
T02D2337:300b-5: gsal rig mtshan nyid thub pa'i dbang po bde gshegs
T02D2337:300b-6: sku // kun gyi gtso// gsum gsal bdag gis mngon
T02D2337:300b-7: sum nyid du legs par rtogs nas bsgom dang bzlas
T02D2337:300b-8: pa gsal por rab tu phye //
T02D2337:300b-9: chos dbyings skye med rgyal ba yum gcig rgyal dang rgyal ba nyid de nam mkha'i ri mo lta //
T02D2337:300b-10: brtan dang g-yo ba rten dang brten pa lha yi
T02D2337:300b-11: rang bzhin rang la bcug nas sna yi rtse mor
T02D2337:300b-12: rdo rje bzlas // gtor ma byin nas dbang po
T02D2337:300b-13: 'bring pos 'od gsal bsgoms te dbang sogs lam dang
T02D2337:300b-15: bdag 'jug dbang dang bla ma mchod byed nyams chags
T02D2337:300b-16: bskang phyir rdo rje'i sems dpa' brtan pa'i cho ga
T02D2337:300b-17: bzlas // rgyal po blon po dmangs kyi byed pas
T02D2337:300b-18: mtshams kyi kun spyod za nyal 'gro dang khrus sogs
T02D2337:300b-19: bzlas // rnal 'byor bya // rnam rtog dang bral
T02D2337:300b-20: zla ba drug tu nges par bsams nas grub pa'i
T02D2337:300b-21: mtshan ma mthong nas rol par gnas //
T02D2337:300b-22: thub pa'i bstan pa rgyas mdzad dngos grub mthar phyin
T02D2337:300b-23: zab dang rgya che ba dang gnyis med dam tshig
T02D2337:300b-24: kun gyi gzhi // bag yod bsgom zhing rten dang
T02D2337:300b-25: gsang ba mi bsag mi 'bral bza' bsrung mchog gyur
T02D2337:300b-27: bslab pa gsum dang rgyu 'bras zhen med dbang sogs
T02D2337:300b-28: 'bras bu rgyud gzhan las gsungs rang sems brtan pas
T02D2337:300b-29: bsrungs // sku gsum la brten ting 'dzin gsum gyis
T02D2337:300b-30: rgya cher rab gsal gzhi lam 'bras bus lta ba
T02D2337:300b-31: bsrungs // mtshon par gyis // rnal 'byor srog rtsol
T02D2337:300b-32: sangs rgyas mnga' bdag g-yon dang g-yas su rim pa
T02D2337:300b-33: ji bzhin rgyu ba nges pa ste //
T02D2337:300b-34: mnyam par bzhag pas 'jug pa'i rlung nyid bum pa
T02D2337:300b-35: can du byas nas bstan pa'i go 'phang so sor
T02D2337:300b-36: thob // rlung gi sbyor ba 'di nyid mi shes
T02D2337:300b-37: las dang las min mi grub rlung rig pas ni
T02D2337:300b-38: thob // 'bras bu ster // gdams pas tshe dang
T02D2337:300b-39: bzlas pa'i rim pa goms pas dge dang mi dge
T02D2337:300b-40: 'chi bzlog rlung rig pas ni shes //
T02D2337:301a-0: bya dang byed las chos mtshungs rgyu tshan gdams pa'i sbyor ba bskyed @301a * //
T02D2337:301a-1: rim goms pas mthun pa'i rkyen dang ldan //
T02D2337:301a-2: gsang spyod la gnas sdug bsngal bzod pas lus gnad
T02D2337:301a-3: gsum ldan dmigs pa bzhi las sbyor ba'i skyon bsal
T02D2337:301a-4: te // steng 'og bar du 'bugs pa'i sbyor ba
T02D2337:301a-5: li ri'i tshul du sgo gsum sbyang bar bya phyir
T02D2337:301a-6: te // nges par rol // rdo rje bzlas pa
T02D2337:301a-7: yig 'bru gsum la goms shing sangs rgyas lnga la
T02D2337:301a-8: kha dog so sor bslab par bya //
T02D2337:301a-9: 'byung ba lnga yi rlung zin pas ni du ba
T02D2337:301a-10: smig rgyu me khyer mar me sprin med nam mkha'
T02D2337:301a-11: 'byung // brtan pa'i rtags su zla zer nyi zer
T02D2337:301a-12: glog gi zer dang 'ja' tshon nyi zlar bsres pa
T02D2337:301a-13: 'byung // dngos su mthong // spyod lam dang ni
T02D2337:301a-14: sbyor ba mkhas pas dug sogs gzhom dang 'chi ba
T02D2337:301a-15: rtag pa la sogs sna tshogs rgyur //
T02D2337:301a-16: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le 'dres pas bde gsal
T02D2337:301a-17: mi rtog rgyun mi 'chad par rgyal por 'gyur ro
T02D2337:301a-18: kye // rim pa 'di nyid 'phel bar bya phyir
T02D2337:301a-19: snang dmigs dngos po sgyu mar bsams la dben ba'i
T02D2337:301a-20: kye // gnas su ni // rdo rje sems dpa'
T02D2337:301a-21: mtshan dpes spras pa'i gzugs brnyan la ni rab tu
T02D2337:301a-22: dmigs la dngos pa chu zla ltar //
T02D2337:301a-23: bcu gnyis sgyu ma'i dpe yis mtshon te mnyam rjes
T02D2337:301a-24: la ni chos brgyad las 'das mkha' bzhin snyoms par
T02D2337:301a-25: 'jug / de ltar shes pas mi bya ba med
T02D2337:301a-26: sngags zlos bsrung sogs mi dgos dge slong sogs la
T02D2337:301a-27: 'jug / phyag mi bya // 'di dang mtshan dus
T02D2337:301a-28: bsre zhing sbyang dang goms pas gyen du 'phangs te
T02D2337:301a-29: bde gshegs bltas la chos sogs mnyan //
T02D2337:301a-30: rmi lam med dus gnad dang ldan pas 'dod chags
T02D2337:301a-31: la sogs brgyad cu 'gags nas snang ba gsum 'das
T02D2337:301a-32: te // rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'od gsal chen pos
T02D2337:301a-33: sa bcur rgyur pa lam ma bgrod na rnam shes
T02D2337:301a-34: te // gong du 'pho // sna tshogs don chen
T02D2337:301a-35: mthong nas shes pa spong ste rim pa gnyis ldan
T02D2337:301a-37: chags dang chags bral 'di ma shes par gzhan ni
T02D2337:301a-38: don med dus gsum sangs rgyas bgrod pa gcig pa'i
T02D2337:301a-39: lam // ri bong rgyug dang zla ba chu 'dzin
T02D2337:301a-40: dus dang 'brel pa bslab bcas sangs rgyas dgongs pa
T02D2337:301a-41: lam // mi shes phyir // sgo gsum gnad kyis
T02D2337:301a-42: sbyang bar bya zhing ngal na sna rtser bltas la
T02D2337:301b-0: @301b nges shes skyes nas chen por blta //
T02D2337:301b-1: dang po'i las kyi yid 'ong la brten goms pas
T02D2337:301b-2: sngags las zhing dang lhan cig skyes sogs rtsa bsnyen
T02D2337:301b-3: bya // cig car mgon po bsgoms nas mthar gnas
T02D2337:301b-4: rdo rje'i bzlas pa rtsa la mkhas pas padma'i skyon
T02D2337:301b-5: bya // bzhi bsal // bde ba'i lam drangs ye
T02D2337:301b-6: shes mtshon pa mar la 'du bar rgyu 'bras shes
T02D2337:301b-8: thur sel gcud nas glang chen seng ge rma bya'i
T02D2337:301b-9: 'dren dang bya rgod stag mos snang dmigs bde bar
T02D2337:301b-10: 'char // sbyor bar dangs ma rlung dang mnyam zhing
T02D2337:301b-11: rig mas bde ba lus la spros nas rtsa mdud
T02D2337:301b-12: 'char // dgrol bar bya // bde ba'i nyams skyes
T02D2337:301b-13: tshogs drug kun la ro mnyam lugs las 'byung dang
T02D2337:301b-14: bzlog pas dga' bzhi mtshon par bya //
T02D2337:301b-15: dga' ba gsum dang dpe don bsres nas rgyu tshogs
T02D2337:301b-16: gzung 'dzin chos nyid goms nas rtsol med 'bras bu
T02D2337:301b-17: 'char // ye shes gsal byed dbang gi 'bras bur
T02D2337:301b-18: rdo rje'i lus la 'khor lor mdud pa spyi bor
T02D2337:301b-19: 'char // grol ba'i gnas // sgo dgu 'gags na
T02D2337:301b-20: sgo bzhi thim pa gnyis kyi rnam grol ye shes
T02D2337:301b-21: lus can sgra brnyan lta bur 'bral //
T02D2337:301b-22: mig sogs stong dang bdud bzhi grol ba chos nyid
T02D2337:301b-23: la mkhas gsum po gcig gyur ye shes rgyun chad
T02D2337:301b-24: med // gzhi lam 'bras bu gcig gyur bde chen
T02D2337:301b-25: dngos po ro mnyam yi ge bzhi don 'bras bu
T02D2337:301b-26: med // mngon du 'gyur // mthar ma skyol na
T02D2337:301b-27: nye bar spyod pa lus ldan bzhi dang nges shes
T02D2337:301b-28: brtags te ngo sprod shes par bya //
T02D2337:301b-29: skye shi bar do shes pa snga phyi gnyid du
T02D2337:301b-30: dran mtshams 'chi ba'i dus su phra rags thim nas
T02D2337:301b-31: ni // 'od gsal chen po de ma rtogs na
T02D2337:301b-32: bla ma sogs kyi skyel bsu nying mtshams rlung gsum
T02D2337:301b-33: ni // bcing ba'i phyir // yon tan rdzogs pa
T02D2337:301b-34: bar dor longs sku yon tan bdun ldan de ma
T02D2337:301b-35: brtan na dug gsum las gyur pa'i //
T02D2337:301b-36: rtogs par bcad la dbang dus nyams dang lha sogs
T02D2337:301b-37: sgyu ma zung du 'jug pa slob dang mi slob
T02D2337:301b-38: pa // bdun phrag re la brgyal bar gyur pa
T02D2337:301b-39: de ma khegs na skye ba sna tshogs sprul sku
T02D2337:301b-40: pa // nyid mtshams sbyor // bar do gsum la
T02D2337:301b-41: 'dod chags la sogs dug gsum shes pa zag med
T02D2337:301b-42: 'od gsal sgyu mar bsres la sgom //
T02D2337:302a-1: 'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das las rgyal ba gnyis med zung 'jug phyag rgya chen por 'gyur //
T02D2337:302a-2: dbang dang dam tshig 'brel par shes ba gdod nas
T02D2337:302a-3: dag pa rkyen gyis bskur tshul nyams su blang dang
T02D2337:302a-4: rtogs // bum sogs dam tshig mnyam gzhag rjes spyod
T02D2337:302a-5: mi 'bral bza' bsrungs spros bcas spros med yan lag
T02D2337:302a-6: rtogs // bshags bya nyid // dbang dus lta sogs
T02D2337:302a-7: mtshon par byas la bdud rigs ngos bzung zil gyis
T02D2337:302a-8: mnan nas sgom dang rtags su 'brel //
T02D2337:302a-9: tha ma 'bring dang rab dang mchog gyur 'jug sgo
T02D2337:302a-10: shes pas bsgoms la sbyar te gang dang gang la
T02D2337:302a-11: sogs // mchog gi dngos grub tshe 'dir 'dod pa
T02D2337:302a-12: dus dang 'brel bar spyod pa byas nas gol sa
T02D2337:302a-13: sogs // bcad par bya // bya dang spyod sogs
T02D2337:302a-14: tshogs su bsgyur la phrin las byed par rab gnas
T02D2337:302a-15: sbyin sreg rnam bzhis 'dod dgur bsgyur //
T02D2337:302a-16: 'khor lo bzhi la sku bzhir yan lag bdun ldan
T02D2337:302a-17: rdo rje sems dpa' sgo gsum ngo sprod mtshan dpes
T02D2337:302a-18: spras // rgyud rnams snying phyung man ngag bcud bsdus
T02D2337:302a-19: lam gyi rim pa bde gshegs kun thugs yid bzhin
T02D2337:302a-20: spras // nor bu nyid // mi mthun phyogs las
T02D2337:302a-21: rgyal bar bya phyir 'jug pa'i tshul dang zhugs pa'i
T02D2337:302a-22: 'bras bu gsal ba'i thabs nyid do //
T02D2337:302a-23: lus la go gyon ngag gis g-yul sprad sems kyis
T02D2337:302a-24: mtshon bsnun sku gsung khrus bcud rlung dang 'khor lo
T02D2337:302a-25: bskor // rtsa ba drug la yan lag so dgus
T02D2337:302a-26: nad la sman dpyad bar chad srung 'khor gnad bral
T02D2337:302a-27: bskor // gegs bsal te // sa la sogs pa'i
T02D2337:302a-28: ro bzhi ngos bzung 'khor lo bzhi yis ro bzhi
T02D2337:302a-29: mnyam la zhi gnas phyogs la ni //
T02D2337:302a-30: thabs dang ldan pa pi wang sgra sogs rtsa rlung
T02D2337:302a-31: la ni shes rab sku gsum mthun sbyor rdzas sogs
T02D2337:302a-32: lnga // zin dang ma zin legs par shes nas
T02D2337:302a-33: lus kyi gnad la nyi ma zla sogs brdzis nas
T02D2337:302a-34: lnga // rdul sprugs byed // 'byung bzhi rlung la
T02D2337:302a-35: lte ba la sogs stong rab bcas nas na tsha
T02D2337:302a-37: bcu pa'i rlung shes ting 'dzin rang grol sman pa
T02D2337:302a-38: lta bus brgyad po bsal nas dngul chu ltar sprad
T02D2337:302a-39: bya // dangs ma bsrubs nas skyon rnams sel phyir
T02D2337:302b-0: bdag tu lta ba'i @302b bud shing bsregs nas 'od
T02D2337:302b-2: 'di don rim brgyud bla ma la bsten gus pas
T02D2337:302b-3: blang phyir byin rlabs lam khyer snyan nas snyan du
T02D2337:302b-4: brgyud // mchog gi blo can brtse ba chen pos
T02D2337:302b-5: theg gzhan spangs pa smin dang grol ba rim pa
T02D2337:302b-6: brgyud // gnyis la 'bad // snod bcud la sogs
T02D2337:302b-7: gzhal yas khang dang phung po khams sogs lha ru
T02D2337:302b-8: dag pas rgyal ba thams cad bsdu'o //
T02D2337:302b-9: rdo rje'i lus la bde chen gnas pas pho nya
T02D2337:302b-10: la sogs spros dang spros med 'khor lo zung du
T02D2337:302b-11: 'jug / rim pa 'di la mos pa brtan pas
T02D2337:302b-12: sprul pa mthong zhing skyon yon dang bcas chung ngu
T02D2337:302b-13: yin phyir tshogs // skad cig bzhi yis dga' ba
T02D2337:302b-14: gsum son 'bring po'i drod de lhan cig skyes pa
T02D2337:302b-16: 'jig rten las 'das brgya phrag bdun po yon tan
T02D2337:302b-17: gyis spras gnas dang nye gnas nyi shu bzhi la
T02D2337:302b-18: sogs // dangs ma yas byon p'ulli sogs khyab rgyu
T02D2337:302b-19: ba mas brtan bde chen brtol nas ma chags padma'i
T02D2337:302b-20: sogs // sa // rab bkram chen po phrag bdun
T02D2337:302b-21: yon tan ye shes gsal byed chos sku bdag nyid
T02D2337:302b-23: 'khor lo sdom pa'i bskyed rdzogs la sogs gting dpag
T02D2337:302b-24: dka' ba gsal por rab phye snyan brgyud mkha' 'gro'i
T02D2337:302b-25: gsang // dri med bsags pa'i dge ba des ni
T02D2337:302b-26: sa gsum gnas pa rdo rje 'dzin pa'i go 'phang
T02D2337:302b-27: thob par shog / yid bzhin nor bu zhes bya
T02D2337:302b-28: ba mkha' 'gro ma'i gsang tshig tilli pas bkod pa
T02D2337:302b-30: / rtsigs kyi rgya mdud dang bcas pa n'a ro pandi ta'i zhal snga nas dang /
